divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a clear summer sky. I looked up and saw three black orbs in the sky.I had know idea what it was. The orbs apeared to be floating around eachother. The orbs flew horizontaly. I'm guessing they flew about the hight of a normal airplane and about as fast. I was pretty exited about the sighting, I told the people in the neighbourhood and they saw it too. In total about 10 people in my neighbourhood saw the objects The sighting took pretty long but eventualy they flew out of sight. Extra info: I live near a airforce millitary base, frequently helicopters and f16's fly over.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hoevelaken
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Three black orbs floating silently through the sky
